base.arg: for $a in (1 to 3), $a in ($a to $a + 3), $a in ($a to $a + 3), $a in ($a to $a + 3), $a in ($a to $a + 3), $a in ($a to $a + 3), $a in ($a to $a + 3), $a in ($a to $a + 3), $a in ($a to $a + 3) return if($a mod 26 = 0) then $a else ()

for $a1 in (1 to 3), $a2 in ($a1 to $a1 + 3), $a3 in ($a2 to $a2 + 3), $a4 in ($a3 to $a3 + 3), $a5 in ($a4 to $a4 + 3), $a6 in ($a5 to $a5 + 3), $a7 in ($a6 to $a6 + 3), $a8 in ($a7 to $a7 + 3), $a9 in ($a8 to $a8 + 3) return if($a9 mod 26 = 0) then $a9 else ()
for $a in (1 to 10), $b in (1 to 10) return $a
